text: "Work of Art (Da Vinci)" is a song recorded by Swedish singer Måns Zelmerlöw. It was released on 13 June 2007 as a digital download in Sweden as the second single from his debut studio album Stand by For... (2007). The song was written by Niklas Edberger, Henrik Wikström and Måns Zelmerlöw. It peaked to number 16 on the Swedish Singles Chart. ==Track listing== ==Chart performance== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! Chart (20) !
